Chapter.Label: Chapter_Functionality
Chapter.Heading: Functionality
Chapter.Section:
Construction Filters
This section will describe the construction filters of right quasigroups.
true or false
A &GAP; category of elements of right quasigroups.

Construction Methods
This section will describe the construction methods of right quasigroups.
true or false
An auxiliary category for &GAP; to tell apart IsMagma and IsRightQuasigroup.
true or false
A &GAP; category of right quasigroups.
The projection right quasigroup on the set set
The operation is defined by x*y=x.
The right quasigroup (Q,*,/), where Q is indexed by set and x*y=f(x,y) and x/y = g(x,y).
The identities f(g(x,y),y)=x and g(f(x,y),y)=x must hold.
The right quasigroup (Q,*,/), where Q is indexed by set and x*y=f(x,y) and x/y = z iff z=f(x,y).
For any x,z there must be a unique y such that f(x,y)=z.
